column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We've dined at this Lincoln Park institution numerous times over the years
column2: and have always enjoyed the experience.  Our most recent visit came on the heels​ of my daughter's college tour of DePaul.  It was a Saturday afternoon and the place was packed. Come to think of it
column3: every time I've been here its been busy.  We were seated right away
column4: but by the time we left there appeared to be a slight wait.
